alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 07 at 2:47AM PST until February 07 at 2:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts to 45 mph. * WHERE...San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning, Riverside County Mountains, San Bernardino County Mountains and San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
